description.value:
Some event has unstuck you in time. You might come from the distant past or a far-flung future. Perhaps you've traveled from some forsaken timeline to stop a cataclysmic event. Whatever the reason, you're now gifted with the ability to see and manipulate time in a way that few others comprehend.

Tradition occult

Paradox Skill Piloting

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Injury Echo]; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Fleet Step]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Temporal Bullets]; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Time's Edge]; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Weight of Ages]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Chrono Push]; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Phantasmal Calamity]; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.True Target]; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Moment of Renewal]; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Foresight]

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Warp Time]; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Accelerate]; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Time Loop]

Quantum Field You have a modicum of control of the temporal flow that surrounds you. An enemy creature that uses a move action inside your quantum field takes a â€“5-foot status penalty to its Speed during that action. You and your allies gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speed during move actions that are used inside your quantum field.
